reviewText:
Dean (Sam Strike) and Damon (George Russo) are Essex boys who meet in prison. After they get out, they work for a drug dealer who owns a bar. Dean is quiet and takes on a menial position. The group has issues within and without as the police attempt to bring them down.

The acting wasn't there. The plot seemed a bit simple. A film that was more drama than action.

Guide: F-word, sex, nudity I had difficulty with the accent.
